page.title: 18MILL HILL/HOLDERS HILL
page.content: {Continued}from page 17 In contrast the{side streets}are rather quiet,with only a few people walking about during the day,and most of these seem to be{elderly people.} The other half of the area is open{ {green space.}There is a fairly large{ {park}with swings and a tennis court. {Copthall Stadium}and{sports ground} cover a large area,and provide an important{recreational}facility. Parallel to the stadium is a private golf course with beautiful landscaping,and a club house.Adjacent to that there are{allotment gardens.} The{Hendon Cemetery}and{crematorium} with its abundance of flowers,is nearby. There are no tall buildings,only the gas works.The neighbourhood is very pleasant and bright.
